filterParam.description: Filter conditions for result queries. You can query by equality, string, or numerical conditions.
filterParam.name: filter

limitParam.description: Limits the number of items to return per page.

limit.summary: return up to 2 items per page

limitParam.name: limit

pageParam.description: The number of the page to return. Ignored if limit parameter is absent.

selectParam.description: The names of the specific fields to return.

sortParam.description: The column names used to sort results. Prefix the name with a minus to request a descending order of sort.
sortParam.name: sort

BatchBackupTasksRequest.description: Instance IDs of the BIG-IP Next instances to be backed up.

platform_type.description: Specifies the platform of this BIG-IP Next instance.

auto_failback.description: Automatically restore operations to the original active node if it is available, or when it becomes available if it is not.
auto_failback.title: Auto Failback

cluster_management_ip.description: The cluster IP address on management network.
cluster_management_ip.title: Cluster Management IP

cluster_name.description: Name of the BIG-IP Next HA instance.

nodes.description: The first item is the configuration for the active node in a BIG-IP Next HA instance. Subsequent items are for other nodes.

standby_instance_id.description: The UUID of a managed standalone BIG-IP Next instance that has been selected to become the standby node in a BIG-IP Next HA instance.

control_plane_address.description: The IP address and netmask of the node on control plane in a BIG-IP Next HA instance.
control_plane_address.title: HA Network Node IP with network mask

data_plane_primary_address.description: Specifies the IP address and network mask used for state mirroring for a BIG-IP Next HA instance.
data_plane_primary_address.title: Primary Mirror IP and network mask

data_plane_secondary_address.description: Specifies the secondary IP address and network mask used for state mirroring between nodes in a BIG-IP Next HA instance.
data_plane_secondary_address.title: Secondary Mirror IP and network mask

name.description: The name of a BIG-IP Next instance. The maximum length is 192 characters.
name.title: Name

instance_id.description: The UUID of a BIG-IP Next instance.
